search.query: index=carbonblack UserName!="" CommandLine!="" $keyword$ NOT (CommandLine="rundll32.exe WSClient.dll,RefreshBannedAppsList" OR CommandLine="C:\Windows\WinStore\WSHost.exe -Embedding" OR CommandLine="scrnsave.scr /s" OR CommandLine="C:\Windows\system32\cleanmgr.exe /autoclean /d C:*" OR CommandLine="*WerFault.exe*" OR CommandLine="rundll32.exe C:\Windows\system32\davclnt.dll,DavSetCookie") NOT (ProcessFileName="wermgr.exe") UserName=* EventSubType IN ("Tamper Protection","Security Alert","Execution block (Custom Rule)","Write block (Custom Rule)","Unapproved process discovered","Agent error") | stats count by CommandLine | sort - count
